Metadata.Title: Remote IIS Administration Application Is Removed
Metadata.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that Remote IIS administration application is removed.

How to Check

The files used for remote IIS admin is at %windir%\system32\inetsrv\iisadmin.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
